trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] bitmap, which consists of the pixel data for a graphics image and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula um [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] bitmap, que consiste em dados de pixel para uma imagem de gráfico e seus atributos.

trans-unit.source: A Bitmap is an object used to work with images defined by pixel data.
trans-unit.target: Um Bitmap é um objeto usado para trabalhar com imagens definidas por dados de pixel.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap consists of the pixel data for a graphics image and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um bitmap é composto dos dados de pixel para uma imagem de gráfico e seus atributos.

trans-unit.source: There are many standard formats for saving a bitmap to a file.
trans-unit.target: Há muitos formatos padrão para salvar um bitmap em um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] supports the following file formats: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG and TIFF.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]suporta os seguintes formatos de arquivo: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG e TIFF.

trans-unit.source: For more information about supported formats, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os formatos com suporte, consulte [tipos de Bitmaps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can create images from files, streams, and other sources by using one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.%23ctor%2A> constructors and save them to a stream or to the file system with the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar imagens de arquivos e fluxos de outras fontes, usando uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.%23ctor%2A>construtores e salvá-los em um fluxo ou ao sistema de arquivos com o <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Images are drawn to the screen or to memory by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Imagens são desenhadas na tela ou à memória usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>método de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of topics about working with image files, see [Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de tópicos sobre como trabalhar com arquivos de imagem, consulte [trabalhando com imagens, Bitmaps, ícones e metarquivos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Bitmap class is not accessible across application domains.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bitmap a classe não é acessível em domínios de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you create a dynamic <xref:System.AppDomain> and create several brushes, pens, and bitmaps in that domain, then pass these objects back to the main application domain, you can successfully use the pens and brushes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você criar um dinâmico <xref:System.AppDomain>e criar vários pincéis, canetas e bitmaps em que domínio, em seguida, passe esses objetos de volta para o domínio de aplicativo principal, você pode usar com êxito o pincéis e canetas.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: However, if you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to draw the marshaled Bitmap, you receive the following exception.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>método para desenhar o Bitmap empacotado, você recebe a seguinte exceção.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: > > Remoting cannot find field "native image" on type "System.Drawing.Image".
trans-unit.target: >> Comunicação remota não é possível localizar o campo "imagem nativa" no tipo "System.Drawing.Image".

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class from the specified existing image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe a partir da imagem existente especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> from which to create the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> do qual criar o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class from the specified data stream.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe do fluxo de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: You must keep the stream open for the lifetime of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve manter o fluxo aberto para o tempo de vida de <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] decoder, an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName> is thrown if you construct a bitmap from a .png image file with a single dimension greater than 65,535 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Devido a uma limitação do [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] decodificador, um <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>é gerada se você construir um bitmap de um arquivo de imagem PNG com uma única dimensão maior que 65.535 pixels.</xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data stream used to load the image.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de dados usado para carregar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: stream does not contain image data or is .
trans-unit.target: streamnão contém dados de imagem ou .

trans-unit.source: -or- stream contains a PNG image file with a single dimension greater than 65,535 pixels.
trans-unit.target: - ou - stream contém um arquivo de imagem PNG com uma única dimensão maior que 65.535 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe do arquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The file name and path can be relative to the application or an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: O nome de arquivo e o caminho podem ser relativo ao aplicativo ou um caminho absoluto.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to open images with the following file formats: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG and TIFF.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor abrir imagens com os seguintes formatos: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG e TIFF.

trans-unit.source: For more information about supported formats, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os formatos com suporte, consulte [tipos de Bitmaps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The file remains locked until the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo permanecerá bloqueado até que o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>é descartado.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: The bitmap file name and path.
trans-unit.target: O caminho e nome de arquivo de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The specified file is not found.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo especificado não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class from the specified existing image, scaled to the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe a partir da imagem existente especificada, escalada para o tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> from which to create the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> do qual criar o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure that represent the size of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> estrutura que representam o tamanho do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe com o tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> with a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> enumeration value of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>com um <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>valor de enumeração de <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class from the specified data stream.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe do fluxo de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: You must keep the stream open for the lifetime of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve manter o fluxo aberto para o tempo de vida de <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] decoder, an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName> is thrown if you construct a bitmap from a .png image file with a single dimension greater than 65,535 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Devido a uma limitação do [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] decodificador, um <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>é gerada se você construir um bitmap de um arquivo de imagem PNG com uma única dimensão maior que 65.535 pixels.</xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data stream used to load the image.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de dados usado para carregar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use color correction for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para usar a correção de cor para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: streamnão contém dados de imagem ou .

trans-unit.source: -or- stream contains a PNG image file with a single dimension greater than 65,535 pixels.
trans-unit.target: - ou - stream contém um arquivo de imagem PNG com uma única dimensão maior que 65.535 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe do arquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to open images with the following file formats: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG and TIFF.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor abrir imagens com os seguintes formatos: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG e TIFF.

trans-unit.source: For more information about supported formats, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os formatos com suporte, consulte [tipos de Bitmaps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The file remains locked until the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo permanecerá bloqueado até que o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>é descartado.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: The name of the bitmap file.
trans-unit.target: O nome do arquivo de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use color correction for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para usar a correção de cor para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class from a specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe a partir de um recurso especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor combines the namespace of the given type with the string name of the resource and looks for a match in the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor combina o namespace do tipo especificado com o nome de cadeia de caracteres do recurso e procura uma correspondência no manifesto do assembly.

trans-unit.source: For example you can pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> type and `Button.bmp` to this constructor and it will look for a resource named `System.Windows.Forms.Button.bmp`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo você pode passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>tipo e `Button.bmp` a este construtor e ele procurará um recurso chamado `System.Windows.Forms.Button.bmp`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: The class used to extract the resource.
trans-unit.target: A classe usada para extrair o recurso.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: O nome do recurso.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class from the specified existing image, scaled to the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe a partir da imagem existente especificada, escalada para o tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> from which to create the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> do qual criar o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class with the specified size and with the resolution of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe com o tamanho especificado e com a resolução especificada <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> that this method creates takes its horizontal and vertical resolution from the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiX%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiY%2A> properties of `g`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>que cria esse método usa sua resolução horizontal e vertical da <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiX%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiY%2A>Propriedades de `g`, respectivamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiY%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiX%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that specifies the resolution for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto que especifica a resolução para o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: g is .
trans-unit.target: gis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class with the specified size and format.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe com o tamanho especificado e o formato.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The pixel format for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O formato de pixel para o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This must specify a value that begins with `Format`.
trans-unit.target: Isso deve especificar um valor que começa com `Format`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> value is specified whose name does not start with *Format*.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> valor for especificado, cujo nome não começa com *formato*.

trans-unit.source: For example, specifying <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> will cause an <xref:System.ArgumentException>, but <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> will not.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, especificar <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> fará com que um <xref:System.ArgumentException>, mas <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> não.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class with the specified size, pixel format, and pixel data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> classe com o tamanho especificado, o formato de pixel e dados de pixel.

trans-unit.source: The caller is responsible for allocating and freeing the block of memory specified by the `scan0` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O chamador é responsável por alocar e liberar o bloco de memória especificado pelo `scan0` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: However, the memory should not be released until the related <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> is released.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a memória não deve ser liberada até que as <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>é liberado.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Integer that specifies the byte offset between the beginning of one scan line and the next.
trans-unit.target: Inteiro que especifica o deslocamento de bytes entre o início da linha de uma verificação e a próxima.

trans-unit.source: This is usually (but not necessarily) the number of bytes in the pixel format (for example, 2 for 16 bits per pixel) multiplied by the width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Isso é normalmente (mas não necessariamente) o número de bytes no formato de pixel (por exemplo, 2 de 16 bits por pixel) multiplicada pela largura de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The value passed to this parameter must be a multiple of four..
trans-unit.target: O valor passado para esse parâmetro deve ser um múltiplo de quatro.

trans-unit.source: The pixel format for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O formato de pixel para o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This must specify a value that begins with `Format`.
trans-unit.target: Isso deve especificar um valor que começa com `Format`.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to an array of bytes that contains the pixel data.
trans-unit.target: Ponteiro para uma matriz de bytes que contém os dados de pixel.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> value is specified whose name does not start with *Format*.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> valor for especificado, cujo nome não começa com *formato*.

trans-unit.source: For example, specifying <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> will cause an <xref:System.ArgumentException>, but <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> will not.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, especificar <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> fará com que um <xref:System.ArgumentException>, mas <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> não.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the section of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> defined by <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure and with a specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia da seção deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> definido por <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura e com um especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Defines the portion of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> to copy.
trans-unit.target: Define a parte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> para copiar.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates are relative to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas são em relação a esse <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The pixel format for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O formato de pixel para o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This must specify a value that begins with `Format`.
trans-unit.target: Isso deve especificar um valor que começa com `Format`.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> que esse método cria.

trans-unit.source: rect is outside of the source bitmap bounds.
trans-unit.target: rectestá fora dos limites do bitmap de origem.

trans-unit.source: The height or width of rect is 0.
trans-unit.target: A altura ou largura de rect é 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> value is specified whose name does not start with *Format*.
trans-unit.target: - ou - um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> valor for especificado, cujo nome não começa com *formato*.

trans-unit.source: For example, specifying <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> will cause an <xref:System.ArgumentException>, but <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> will not.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, especificar <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> fará com que um <xref:System.ArgumentException>, mas <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> não.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the section of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> defined with a specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia da seção deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> definida com um especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Defines the portion of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> to copy.
trans-unit.target: Define a parte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> para copiar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> enumeration for the destination <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> enumeração para o destino <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> que esse método cria.

trans-unit.source: rect is outside of the source bitmap bounds.
trans-unit.target: rectestá fora dos limites do bitmap de origem.

trans-unit.source: The height or width of rect is 0.
trans-unit.target: A altura ou largura de rect é 0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> from a Windows handle to an icon.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> de um identificador do Windows para um ícone.

trans-unit.source: A handle to an icon.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para um ícone.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> que esse método cria.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> from the specified Windows resource.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> do recurso especificado do Windows.

trans-unit.source: FromResource requires security permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: FromResource requer permissão de segurança para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: For a managed alternative for creating a bitmap from an embedded resource, see <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma alternativa gerenciada para criar um bitmap de um recurso inserido, consulte <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: FromResource works only with bitmaps that are named resources in a DLL.
trans-unit.target: FromResource só funciona com bitmaps que são nomeados recursos em uma DLL.

trans-unit.source: A handle to an instance of the executable file that contains the resource.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para uma instância do arquivo executável que contém o recurso.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the resource bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do bitmap de recurso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> que esse método cria.

trans-unit.source: Creates a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] bitmap object from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] objeto bitmap neste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for calling the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `DeleteObject` method to free the memory used by the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] bitmap object.
trans-unit.target: Você é responsável por chamar o [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `DeleteObject` método para liberar a memória usada pelo [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] objeto bitmap.

trans-unit.source: For more information about GDI bitmaps, see [Bitmaps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=205685) in the Windows GDI documentation.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre GDI bitmaps, consulte [Bitmaps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=205685) na documentação do Windows GDI.

trans-unit.source: A handle to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] bitmap object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para o [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] objeto bitmap que esse método cria.

trans-unit.source: The height or width of the bitmap is greater than <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: A altura ou largura de bitmap é maior do que <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>.</xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Creates a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] bitmap object from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] objeto bitmap neste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for calling the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `DeleteObject` method to free the memory used by the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] bitmap object.
trans-unit.target: Você é responsável por chamar o [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `DeleteObject` método para liberar a memória usada pelo [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] objeto bitmap.

trans-unit.source: For more information about GDI bitmaps, see [Bitmaps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=205685) in the Windows GDI documentation.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre GDI bitmaps, consulte [Bitmaps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=205685) na documentação do Windows GDI.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that specifies the background color.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que especifica a cor do plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored if the bitmap is totally opaque.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro será ignorado se o bitmap for totalmente opaco.

trans-unit.source: A handle to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] bitmap object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para o [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] objeto bitmap que esse método cria.

trans-unit.source: The height or width of the bitmap is greater than <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: A altura ou largura de bitmap é maior do que <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>.</xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Returns the handle to an icon.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o identificador para um ícone.

trans-unit.source: Initially, an icon created from the handle will have the same size as the original bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, um ícone criado a partir do identificador terá o mesmo tamanho que o bitmap original.

trans-unit.source: A Windows handle to an icon with the same image as the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para um ícone com a mesma imagem do Windows a <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color of the specified pixel in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor do pixel especificado neste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the pixel to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do pixel para recuperar.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the pixel to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do pixel para recuperar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of the specified pixel.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor do pixel especificado.

trans-unit.source: x is less than 0, or greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: xé menor que 0, ou maior que ou igual a .

trans-unit.source: -or- y is less than 0, or greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: - ou - y é menor que 0, ou maior que ou igual a .

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Locks a <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> into system memory.
trans-unit.target: Bloqueia um <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> na memória do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method to lock an existing bitmap in system memory so that it can be changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>método para bloquear um bitmap existente na memória do sistema para que ele pode ser alterado por meio de programação.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the color of an image with the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A> method, although the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method offers better performance for large-scale changes.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar a cor de uma imagem com o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>método, embora o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>método oferece melhor desempenho para alterações em larga escala.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData> specifies the attributes of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, such as size, pixel format, the starting address of the pixel data in memory, and length of each scan line (stride).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData>Especifica os atributos de <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, como tamanho, formato de pixel, o endereço inicial dos dados de pixel na memória e o comprimento de cada linha de verificação (stride).</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData>

trans-unit.source: When calling this method, you should use a member of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration that contains a specific bits-per-pixel (BPP) value.
trans-unit.target: Ao chamar esse método, você deve usar um membro de <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName>enumeração que contém um valor específico bits por pixel (BPP).</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName> values such as <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Usando <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName>valores como <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>e <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>lançará um <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Also, passing the incorrect pixel format for a bitmap will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, passar o formato de pixel incorreto para um bitmap lançará um <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that specifies the portion of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> to lock.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que especifica a parte da estrutura de <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> em bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the access level (read/write) for the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o nível de acesso (leitura/gravação) para o <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> enumeration that specifies the data format of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o formato de dados deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"></xref> that contains information about this lock operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a operação de bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> is not a specific bits-per-pixel value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> não é um valor específico de bits por pixel.

trans-unit.source: -or- The incorrect <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> is passed in for a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: - ou - incorreto <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> é passado para um bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Locks a <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> into system memory
trans-unit.target: Bloqueia um <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> na memória do sistema

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method to lock an existing bitmap in system memory so that it can be changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>método para bloquear um bitmap existente na memória do sistema para que ele pode ser alterado por meio de programação.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the color of an image with the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A> method, although the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method offers better performance for large-scale changes.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar a cor de uma imagem com o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>método, embora o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>método oferece melhor desempenho para alterações em larga escala.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When calling this method, you should use a member of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration that contains a specific bits-per-pixel (BPP) value.
trans-unit.target: Ao chamar esse método, você deve usar um membro de <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName>enumeração que contém um valor específico bits por pixel (BPP).</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName> values, such as <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>, will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Usando <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName>valores, como <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>e <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>, lançará um <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Also, passing the incorrect pixel format for a bitmap will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, passar o formato de pixel incorreto para um bitmap lançará um <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method is intended to be used with a `flags` value of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>método se destina a ser usado com um `flags` valor <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>

trans-unit.source: A rectangle structure that specifies the portion of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> to lock.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura de retângulo que especifica a parte do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> em bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode"></xref> values that specifies the access level (read/write) for the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode"> </xref> valores que especifica o nível de acesso (leitura/gravação) para o <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> values that specifies the data format of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> valores que especifica o formato de dados do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"></xref> that contains information about the lock operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a operação de bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"></xref> that contains information about the lock operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a operação de bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> value is not a specific bits-per-pixel value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref>valor não é um valor específico de bits por pixel.

trans-unit.source: -or- The incorrect <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> is passed in for a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: - ou - incorreto <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> é passado para um bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Makes the default transparent color transparent for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Torna a cor transparente padrão transparente para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The system palette defines one color as the default transparent, or alpha, color.
trans-unit.target: A paleta do sistema define uma cor como a cor transparente ou alfa, do padrão.

trans-unit.source: This method makes the default transparent color transparent for this <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método torna a cor transparente padrão transparente para este <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: If no transparent color is specified by the system, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.LightGray%2A> is the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma cor transparente é especificado pelo sistema, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.LightGray%2A>é a cor transparente.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.LightGray%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.MakeTransparent%2A>, the bitmap will be converted to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> format, as this format supports an alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.MakeTransparent%2A>, o bitmap será convertido para o <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>Formatar, como esse formato oferece suporte a um canal alfa.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.MakeTransparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The image format of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> is an icon format.
trans-unit.target: O formato da imagem de <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> é um formato de ícone.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Makes the specified color transparent for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Torna a cor especificada transparente para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you call MakeTransparent, the bitmap will be converted to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> format, as this format supports an alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama MakeTransparent, o bitmap será convertido para o <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>Formatar, como esse formato oferece suporte a um canal alfa.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color to make transparent.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor para tornar transparente.

trans-unit.source: The image format of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> is an icon format.
trans-unit.target: O formato da imagem de <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> é um formato de ícone.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Sets the color of the specified pixel in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define a cor do pixel especificado neste <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use SetPixel method to set the color of an individual pixel in an image programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Use o método SetPixel para definir a cor de um pixel individual em uma imagem programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: You can also change an image programmatically by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode alterar uma imagem programaticamente usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically for large-scale changes, the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method offers better performance.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, para alterações em larga escala, o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>método oferece melhor desempenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the pixel to set.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do pixel para definir.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the pixel to set.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do pixel para definir.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color to assign to the specified pixel.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor para atribuir ao pixel especificado.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Sets the resolution for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define a resolução para esse <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to set the desired resolution on a newly created bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para definir a resolução desejada em um bitmap recém-criado.

trans-unit.source: Changing the resolution of the image does not change its physical size.
trans-unit.target: Alterar a resolução da imagem não altera seu tamanho físico.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal resolution, in dots per inch, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A resolução horizontal, em pontos por polegada, do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The vertical resolution, in dots per inch, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A resolução vertical, em pontos por polegada, do <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Unlocks this <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> from system memory.
trans-unit.target: Desbloqueia isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> da memória do sistema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData> specifies the attributes of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, such as size, pixel format, the starting address of the pixel data in memory, and length of each scan line (stride).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData>Especifica os atributos de <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, como tamanho, formato de pixel, o endereço inicial dos dados de pixel na memória e o comprimento de cada linha de verificação (stride).</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"></xref> that specifies information about the lock operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"> </xref> que especifica informações sobre a operação de bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.
